title: Impact of food waste campaigns muted, but point toward right direction

title_detail.value: Impact of food waste campaigns muted, but point toward right direction

summary: Food waste campaigns are a low-cost way to curb waste at all-you-can-eat dining establishments, but they may need to be combined with other environmental changes to make a difference, says new research.

summary_detail.value: Food waste campaigns are a low-cost way to curb waste at all-you-can-eat dining establishments, but they may need to be combined with other environmental changes to make a difference, says new research.
